trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays data in a customizable grid.
trans-unit.target: 表示可自定义的网格中显示数据的控件。

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid control provides a flexible way to display a collection of data in rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 控件提供一种灵活的方式，在行和列中显示的数据集合。

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid includes built-in column types and a template column for hosting custom content.
trans-unit.target: 数据网格包括内置的列类型和用于承载自定义内容的模板列。

trans-unit.source: The built-in row type includes a drop-down details section that you can use to display additional content below the cell values.
trans-unit.target: 内置的行类型包括一个可用于显示在单元格值下方的其他内容的下拉菜单的详细信息部分。

trans-unit.source: Binding to Data To bind the DataGrid to data, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到数据到绑定到数据，数据网格设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>实现。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the data grid is bound to an object in the data source, and each column in the data grid is bound to a property of the data object.
trans-unit.target: 数据网格中的每一行绑定到数据源中的一个对象，并在数据网格中的每一列绑定到数据对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: In order for the DataGrid user interface to update automatically when items are added to or removed from the source data, the DataGrid must be bound to a collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface, such as an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 为了使 DataGrid 用户界面，自动更新添加到或将源数据中删除项时，DataGrid 必须绑定到集合可实现<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>接口，如<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: To automatically reflect property changes, the objects in the source collection must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要自动反映属性更改，源集合中的对象必须实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定 (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Columns By default, the DataGrid control generates columns automatically when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 列︰ 默认情况下，DataGrid 控件将自动生成列设置时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of column that is generated depends on the type of data in the column.
trans-unit.target: 生成的列的类型取决于列中的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the generated columns types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出生成的列类型。

trans-unit.source: |Generated Column Type|Data Type| |---------------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|<xref:System.String>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|<xref:System.Boolean>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|<xref:System.Enum>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|<xref:System.Uri>| The following illustration shows each of the column types.
trans-unit.target: |生成列类型 |数据类型 | |---------------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|<xref:System.String>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|<xref:System.Boolean>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|<xref:System.Enum>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|<xref:System.Uri>| 下图显示了每个列类型。</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn> </xref:System.Enum> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>

trans-unit.source: ![DataGrid with all four default column types](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "DataGrid with all four default column types") When columns are auto-generated, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event to customize or cancel columns before they are added to the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: ![与所有四种默认列类型的 DataGrid](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "与所有四种默认列类型的 DataGrid")自动生成列时，你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>事件自定义或取消之前将它们添加到 DataGrid 的列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>

trans-unit.source: If you add both user-defined columns and auto-generated columns to the DataGrid, the user-defined columns are added first.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将用户定义的列和自动生成列添加到数据网格中，首先添加的用户定义的列。

trans-unit.source: To rearrange the display order of the columns, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> property for individual columns.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新排列的列的显示顺序，可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>各个列的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can prevent automatic column generation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置阻止自动生成列<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to create and configure all columns explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，如果你想要创建和显式配置的所有列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn> type to define a custom column if the built-in column types do not meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>类型来定义自定义列，如果内置的列类型不能满足你的需求。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn> type provides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A> properties that enable you to specify content templates for both display and editing modes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>类型提供了<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A>使您能够指定用于显示和编辑模式的内容模板的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: For example, you could define a custom column for dates.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以定义的自定义列的日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A> could define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to display a date, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A> could define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> control to edit the date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A>可以定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>显示的日期和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A>可以定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>控件编辑的日期。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection to programmatically add, insert, remove, and change any columns in the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>集合以编程方式添加、 插入、 删除和在运行时更改控件中的任何列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsAutoGenerated%2A> property to determine whether a column is auto generated or user defined.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsAutoGenerated%2A>属性来确定列是否为自动生成或用户定义。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsAutoGenerated%2A>

trans-unit.source: Auto-generated columns will be automatically added, removed, or regenerated when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: 自动生成的列将自动添加，已删除或重新生成时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Selection By default, the entire row is selected when a user clicks a cell in a DataGrid, and a user can select multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击 DataGrid 中的单元格，并且用户可以选择多个行，选择所选内容默认情况下，整个行。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> property to specify whether a user can select cells, full rows, or both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>属性来指定用户可选择单元格和 / 或整行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> property to specify whether multiple rows or cells can be selected, or only single rows or cells.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>属性来指定多个行或单元格可以选择、，还是仅单一行或单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get information about the cells that are selected from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取有关从选择的单元格信息<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get information about cells for which selection has changed in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取有关所选内容中为其已更改的单元格信息<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectAllCells%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnselectAllCells%2A> methods to programmatically select or unselect all cells.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectAllCells%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnselectAllCells%2A>方法以编程方式选择或取消选择所有单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnselectAllCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectAllCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Behavior in the DataGrid Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认键盘和鼠标 DataGrid 控件中的行为](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Grouping, Sorting, and Filtering By default, you can sort items in a DataGrid by clicking the column header.
trans-unit.target: 分组、 排序，和筛选通过默认情况下，您可以通过单击列标题排序 DataGrid 中的项。

trans-unit.source: You can customize sorting by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Sorting> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义排序通过处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Sorting>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the default sort, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSortingEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消默认排序，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSortingEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSortingEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also sort the source data before it is displayed in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 在显示 DataGrid 中之前，也可以进行排序的源数据。

trans-unit.source: To group, sort, and filter data in the DataGrid, you bind the DataGrid to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView> implementation that supports these operations.
trans-unit.target: 为组、 排序和筛选数据网格中的数据绑定到 DataGrid<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView>支持这些操作的实现。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView>

trans-unit.source: You then perform the operations on the collection view.
trans-unit.target: 然后执行集合视图上的操作。

trans-unit.source: When items are grouped in the DataGrid, you can define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> that specifies the appearance of each group.
trans-unit.target: 在项进行分组的数据网格中，你可以定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>，它指定每个组的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>

trans-unit.source: You apply the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> by adding it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> collection of the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 你将应用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>通过将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>DataGrid 的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple levels of grouping, you can apply different styles to each group level.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个级别的分组，你可以将不同样式应用到每个分组级别。

trans-unit.source: Styles are applied in the order in which they are defined.
trans-unit.target: 在其中定义的顺序应用样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Group, Sort, and Filter Data in the DataGrid Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[How to︰ 组、 排序和 DataGrid 控件中的筛选器数据](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Editing By default, you can edit items directly in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 编辑︰ 默认情况下，你可以编辑直接在数据网格中的项。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee that edits can be committed and canceled correctly, the objects in the DataGrid must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保可以提交并正确取消编辑，DataGrid 中的对象必须实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `true` to disable editing in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>属性`true`若要禁用在数据网格中进行编辑。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid has built-in support for the following editing commands: |Command|Default Input Binding| |-------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEditCommand>|F2| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand>|ESC| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand>|ENTER| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand%2A>|DELETE| You put the current cell into edit mode by clicking it or pressing F2.
trans-unit.target: 数据网格提供内置支持下列编辑命令: |命令 |默认输入的绑定 | |-------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEditCommand>|F2 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand>|ESC | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand>|输入 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand%2A>|删除 | 通过单击它，或按 f2 键将当前单元格置于编辑模式中，你。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEditCommand>

trans-unit.source: A cell-level edit is committed when you move to another cell in the same row or press ENTER while the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 单元格级编辑时提交移动到同一行中的另一个单元格或单元格处于编辑模式时按 ENTER。

trans-unit.source: All edits in a row are committed when you move to another row or press ENTER while the row is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 当你移动到另一行或行处于编辑模式时按 enter 键时，行中的所有编辑都将提交。

trans-unit.source: You cancel a cell edit by pressing ESC one time, and cancel all edits in a row by pressing ESC two times.
trans-unit.target: 你通过一次，按 esc 键取消单元格的编辑，并按 esc 键两次取消行中的所有编辑。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatically committing and canceling edits, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEdit%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEdit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关以编程方式提交以及取消编辑的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEdit%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEdit%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about edit-related events, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellEditEnding>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowEditEnding>.
trans-unit.target: 有关编辑相关的事件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellEditEnding>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowEditEnding>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowEditEnding> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellEditEnding> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A> properties to specify whether a user can add or delete rows.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A>属性以指定用户是否可以添加或删除行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user can delete selected rows by pressing the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过按 DELETE 键删除选定的行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A> property is set to `true`, a new item row is added as the last row in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>属性设置为`true`，作为 DataGrid 中的最后一行中添加新项一行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set default values for new items by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过处理设置的新项的默认值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Whether editing actions are allowed is influenced by a variety of additional factors, including the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> state of the DataGrid, and whether the underlying data collection allows the action.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 是否允许编辑操作会影响其他因素，包括各种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A>状态的数据网格，以及有关基础数据集合是否允许该操作。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Validation The DataGrid enables you to perform validation at both the cell and row level.
trans-unit.target: 验证 DataGrid 使您可以执行的单元格和行级别的验证。

trans-unit.source: With cell-level validation, you validate individual properties of a bound data object when a user updates a value.
trans-unit.target: 与单元格级别验证时用户更新的值验证绑定的数据对象的各个属性。

trans-unit.source: With row-level validation, you validate entire data objects when a user commits changes to a row.
trans-unit.target: 与行级别验证用户提交更改的行时验证整个数据对象。

trans-unit.source: You can provide customized visual feedback for row-level validation errors by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A> property, or you can use the default error indicator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以通过设置行级别验证错误提供自定义 visual 反馈<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A>属性，也可以使用默认的错误指示器。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a custom validation rule, create a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建自定义验证规则，创建派生自的类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>类，实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: Add the custom validation rule to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationRules%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 向其添加自定义验证规则<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationRules%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the DataGrid Control The DataGrid control supports common table formatting options, such as alternating row backgrounds and the ability to show or hide headers, gridlines, and scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 DataGrid 控件 DataGrid 控件支持公用表格式设置选项，如交替行背景以及显示或隐藏标头、 网格线和滚动条的能力。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the control provides several style and template properties that you can use to completely change the appearance of the control and its rows, columns, headers, and cells.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该控件提供多个可用于彻底更改控件及其行、 列、 标头，以及单元格的外观的样式和模板的属性。

trans-unit.source: To customize DataGrid behavior, you can handle events for selection change, cell editing, and column re-ordering.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义 DataGrid 行为，你可以处理所选内容更改、 单元格编辑和列重新排序的事件。

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid also exposes several events for row recycling that you can handle to customize rows.
trans-unit.target: 数据网格还公开多个事件的回收你可以处理自定义行的行。

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple DataGrid controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个 DataGrid 控件中，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the DataGrid, see [DataGrid Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于 DataGrid 的状态，请参阅[DataGrid 样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in the DataGrid control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 DataGrid 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Common Tasks The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 常见任务下表提供了有关通常与数据网格关联的任务的信息。

trans-unit.source: |Task|Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |Set alternating row background colors|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A> property to 2 or more, and then assign a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground%2A> properties.| |Define cell and row selection behavior|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties.| |Customize the visual appearance of headers, cells and rows|Apply a new <xref:System.Windows.Style> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowStyle%2A> properties.| |Set sizing options|Set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: |任务 |实现 | |----------|--------------------| |设置交替行背景色 |将<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A>属性设置为 2 或更多，并将<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>给<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground%2A>属性。 | |定义单元格和行选择行为 |设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>属性。 | |自定义可视外观的标头、 单元格和行 |将新<xref:System.Windows.Style>应用于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowStyle%2A>属性。 | |设置调整大小选项 |Set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> properties.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Style></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Sizing Options in the DataGrid Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).| |Access selected items|Check the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> property to get the selected cells and check the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> property to get the selected rows.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 DataGrid 控件中调整选项](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 | |访问所选项目 |检查<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>属性来获取所选单元格和检查<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>属性来获取所选的行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> property.| |Customize end-user interactions|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserReorderColumns%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeColumns%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeRows%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserSortColumns%2A> properties.| |Cancel or change auto-generated columns|Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event.| |Freeze a column|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A> property to 1 and move the column to the left-most position by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> property to 0.| |Use XML data as the data source|Bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> on the DataGrid to the XPath query representing the collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>属性。 | |自定义最终用户交互 |设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserReorderColumns%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeColumns%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeRows%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserSortColumns%2A>属性。 | |取消或更改自动生成的列 |处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>事件。 | |冻结列 |将<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A>属性设置为 1 并将<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>属性设置为 0 将列移至最左边的位置。 | |使用 XML 数据作为数据源 |将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>上表示的项的集合的 XPath 查询到 DataGrid。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserSortColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserReorderColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create each column in the DataGrid.

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[How to︰ 组、 排序和 DataGrid 控件中的筛选器数据](../Topic/How%20to:%20Group,%20Sort,%20and%20Filter%20Data%20in%20the%20DataGrid%20Control.md)。 | |显示行的详细信息部分 |定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A>来指定详细信息部分中的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.target: AlternatingRowBackground， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>属性共同决定每个行的背景的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the columns are created automatically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动创建列。

trans-unit.source: Setting AutoGenerateColumns to `true` or `false` creates or removes auto-generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 AutoGenerateColumns`true`或`false`将创建或删除自动生成的列。

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateColumns property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event will be raised for each column that is created.
trans-unit.target: 当 AutoGenerateColumns 属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>对于创建每个列，将引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>

trans-unit.source: You can change or cancel the column being created in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改或取消正在创建中的列<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>

trans-unit.source: When auto-generation of all columns is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，自动生成的所有列时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event is raised for each column created.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The AutoGeneratedColumns event is raised every time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> attempts to generate columns.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 每次引发 AutoGeneratedColumns 事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>尝试生成列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, AutoGeneratedColumns is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> is initialized, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> is set to `true`, or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is changed, even if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is `null`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a row or cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 发生之前的行或单元格进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you perform special processing before a cell or row enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可让你之前单元格执行特殊处理格或行进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this event provides information about the keyboard or mouse gesture that was used to enter editing mode, and gives you the option of canceling edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此事件提供有关用于进入编辑模式，并提供你的取消选项编辑模式的键盘或鼠标笔势的信息。

trans-unit.source: If this event is not canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit> event is raised when this event completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消此事件，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>此事件完成时引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand"></xref> command for the cell or row currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand"></xref>命令的单元格或行当前处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is currently in edit mode, the CancelEdit method cancels the cell edit, but not any pending row edits.
trans-unit.target: 如果单元格当前处于编辑模式，CancelEdit 方法取消单元格的编辑，但不是任何挂起的行编辑。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is not in edit mode, CancelEdit cancels all pending row edits.
trans-unit.target: 如果单元格不处于编辑模式，CancelEdit 将取消所有挂起行编辑。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row exits edit mode, or if no cells or rows are in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前的单元格或行退出编辑模式，或者没有单元格或行处于编辑模式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand"></xref> command for the specified cell or row in edit mode.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to cancel row or cell edits.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否取消行或单元格的编辑的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row exits edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a cell edit is committed or canceled.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel this event by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellEditEndingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the `e` argument to `true` in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置取消此事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellEditEndingEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`e`参数`true`的事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellEditEndingEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If canceled, the cell remains in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消，此单元格处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: If this event is not canceled, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellEditEndingEventArgs.EditAction%2A> will be performed to commit or cancel the edit.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消此事件，指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellEditEndingEventArgs.EditAction%2A>将执行提交或取消编辑。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellEditEndingEventArgs.EditAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: When scrolling, the panels have to compute an offset to know which part of the panel should appear in the view port.

trans-unit.source: Use the Columns collection to add columns, remove columns, or update properties on the columns.
trans-unit.target: 列集合用于添加列、 删除列，或更新的列上的属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order of columns in the collection does not determine the order that they will appear in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 集合中的列的顺序不确定它们将显示在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>的顺序

trans-unit.source: Each column in the Columns collection defines a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Columns 集合中的每一列将某列定义中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the four column types that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> provides.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出这四种列类型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>提供。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: |Column Type|Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|Use to display URI data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|Use to display enumeration data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|Use to display text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|Use to display Boolean data.| In addition, you can define your own custom column by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.
trans-unit.target: |列类型 |数据显示 | |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|用于显示 URI 数据。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|用于显示枚举数据。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|用于显示文本。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|用于显示布尔数据。 | 此外，你可以通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>定义你自己的自定义列</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: Columns in the collection must derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的列必须从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>派生

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn>, which adds support for binding, derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> and is the base for several of the defined column types.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn>，这将添加绑定，支持派生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>为多个定义的列类型是底数。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand"></xref> command for the cell or row currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand"></xref>命令的单元格或行当前处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is currently being edited, this method commits any pending changes to the cell without committing any pending changes to the row.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在编辑的单元格，此方法提交任意挂起的更改到单元格且不将任何挂起的更改提交到的行。

trans-unit.source: This means that changes are propagated from the cell editing control to the pending row.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着更改从单元格内编辑控件添加到该挂起行传播。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is not currently being edited, all pending row edits are committed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在编辑单元格，所有挂起的行编辑不会提交。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row exits edit mode, or if no cells or rows are in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前的单元格或行退出编辑模式，或者没有单元格或行处于编辑模式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand"></xref> command for the specified cell or row currently in edit mode.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the drag indicator that is displayed while dragging a column header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置呈现拖动指示器拖动列标题时显示时使用的样式。

trans-unit.source: To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the drag indicator, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义<xref:System.Windows.Style>拖动指示器中，指定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set properties in the style to change the appearance of certain elements of the drag indicator, such as the border around the column header.
trans-unit.target: 可以在要更改的外观的某些元素的拖动指示器，如列标题的边框的样式来设置属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the default template for the drag indicator uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> with an image of the original column header that is being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 但是，拖动指示器的默认模板使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>来绘制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>原始列标题所拖动的映像。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: As a result, if you set some properties in your style, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>, they will appear to not be applied.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你设置某些属性在样式中，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>，它们将显示不会应用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the appearance of the column header while it is being dragged, apply a new template that does not use the default <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改列标题的外观进行拖动时，应用新模板不使用默认<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether row virtualization is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用行虚拟化。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, the EnableRowVirtualization property is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: 若要提高性能，EnableRowVirtualization 属性设置为`true`默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: When the EnableRowVirtualization property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> does not instantiate a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item in the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 当 EnableRowVirtualization 属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>不会实例化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>绑定的数据源中的每个数据项的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> objects only when they are needed, and reuses them as much as it can.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>对象仅当它们需要而且重复使用它们作为它得多地</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item that is currently in view and recycles the row when it scrolls out of view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>为每个数据项的当前视图中，当它滚动出视野时回收行的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if row virtualization is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了行虚拟化;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取引用的已设定焦点的单元格的默认边框画笔的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of non-scrolling columns.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置非滚动的列数。

trans-unit.source: Frozen columns are columns that are always displayed and cannot be scrolled out of visibility.
trans-unit.target: 冻结的列是始终显示，并且不能滚动到可见性的列。

trans-unit.source: Frozen columns are always the leftmost columns in display order.
trans-unit.target: 冻结的列始终是显示顺序中的最左侧列。

trans-unit.source: You cannot drag frozen columns into the group of unfrozen columns or drag unfrozen columns into the group of frozen columns.
trans-unit.target: 无法将冻结的列拖到的未冻结的列组，或将未冻结的列拖到的冻结列组。

trans-unit.source: To freeze columns, set the FrozenColumnCount property.
trans-unit.target: 若要冻结的列，设置 FrozenColumnCount 属性。

trans-unit.source: The leftmost columns specified by the FrozenColumnCount number will become frozen.
trans-unit.target: 指定按 FrozenColumnCount 数的最左侧列将变为冻结状态。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the FrozenColumnCount to 2, the two left columns in the display are frozen.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 FrozenColumnCount 设置为 2 时，在显示的两个左的列均已冻结。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a column is already frozen, check the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsFrozen%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>.

trans-unit.source: Each row in the data grid is bound to an object in the data source, and each column in the data grid is bound to a property of the data object.

trans-unit.target: 此方法将生成包含每个属性的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: Calling the GenerateColumns method provides the same functionality as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用 GenerateColumns 方法提供与设置相同的功能<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: You will typically not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: 通常将不从你的代码中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided to enable designer tools to generate a collection of columns that can be edited by the user and then placed into the data grid.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于启用设计器工具来生成可以编辑用户，然后放入数据网格的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: A designer tool can use the GenerateColumns method to return a collection of auto-generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 设计器工具可以使用 GenerateColumns 方法以返回自动生成的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: The designer tool can then provide a user interface to enable the user to edit the column types, and add or remove columns as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该设计器工具可以提供一个用户界面来使用户可以编辑的列类型，并添加或删除根据需要的列。

trans-unit.source: The column collection can then be used to populate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the data grid by adding each column to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用列集合来填充<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>数据网格，通过将每个列添加到集合的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.target: 之后，将会<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>实例化，以便你可以自定义它然后使用它。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A> property is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: 若要提高性能，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>属性设置为`true`默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> does not instantiate a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item in the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>不会实例化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>绑定的数据源中的每个数据项的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> objects only when they are needed, and reuses them as much as it can.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>对象仅当它们需要而且重复使用它们作为它得多地</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item that is currently in view and recycles the row when it scrolls out of view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>为每个数据项的当前视图中，当它滚动出视野时回收行的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> property of all columns must be unique integers from 0 to<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection.Count%2A> -1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>要求<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>所有列的属性必须为从 0 到的唯一整数<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection.Count%2A>-1。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection.Count%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> of one column changes, the change will typically cause the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> of other columns to change too.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>一列更改时，更改通常会导致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>的其他列来更改太。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting RowHeight tells the layout system the amount of space requested by each row.

trans-unit.source: The return value of this property is always the value that it was set to.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to visually indicate an error in row validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于直观地指示行验证中的错误的模板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> control enables you to perform validation at both the cell and row level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>控制，你可以执行的单元格和行级别的验证。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: With cell-level validation, you validate individual properties of a bound data object when a user updates a value.
trans-unit.target: 与单元格级别验证时用户更新的值验证绑定的数据对象的各个属性。

trans-unit.source: With row-level validation, you validate entire data objects when a user commits changes to a row.
trans-unit.target: 与行级别验证用户提交更改的行时验证整个数据对象。

trans-unit.source: You can provide customized visual feedback for row-level validation errors by specifying a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> that defines the appearance of the error indicator.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以通过指定行级别验证错误提供自定义的可视反馈<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，它定义的错误指示器的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Set the RowValidationErrorTemplate property to `null` to use the default error indicator.
trans-unit.target: 将 RowValidationErrorTemplate 属性设置为`null`若要使用默认的错误指示器。

trans-unit.source: The template that is used to visually indicate an error in row validation.
trans-unit.target: 用于直观地指示行验证中的错误模板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> control enables you to perform validation at both the cell and row level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>控制，你可以执行的单元格和行级别的验证。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: With cell-level validation, you validate individual properties of a bound data object when a user updates a value.
trans-unit.target: 与单元格级别验证时用户更新的值验证绑定的数据对象的各个属性。

trans-unit.source: With row-level validation, you validate entire data objects when a user commits changes to a row.
trans-unit.target: 与行级别验证用户提交更改的行时验证整个数据对象。

trans-unit.source: To create a custom validation rule, create a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建自定义验证规则，创建派生自的类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>类，实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: Add the custom validation rule to the RowValidationRules collection.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义验证规则添加到 RowValidationRules 集合。

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>属性时，将忽略 RowValidationRules 属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemBindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of cells that are currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前所选的单元格的列表。

trans-unit.source: There are three selection modes for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 有三个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>选择模式

trans-unit.source: The selection mode is set with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 选择模式设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>, SelectedCells or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> will contain a collection of selected items as defined in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>，SelectedCells 或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>定义下表中将包含所选的项的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit> value|SelectedCells value|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> value| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>|Collection of selected cells|Empty| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>|Collection of cells in the selected rows|Collection of selected rows| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>|Collection of selected cells, including all cells in a selected row|Collection of selected rows or empty if no full rows are selected| When a cell is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`, and the cell is added to the SelectedCells collection.
trans-unit.target: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>值 |SelectedCells 值 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>值 | |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>|选定的单元格的集合 |空 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>|将选定行中的单元格的集合 |选定行的集合 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>|选定的单元格，在选定的行中包括所有单元格的集合 |所选的行或如果未不选择任何完整行则为空的集合 | 选择单元格时，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected?displayProperty=fullName>引发事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`true`，该单元格添加到 SelectedCells 集合并。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>

trans-unit.source: When a row is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`, and the row is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 当选择行时，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected?displayProperty=fullName>引发事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`true`，并将行添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the selection changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged> events are raised if the new or old selection contains a row.
trans-unit.target: 当所选内容更改时，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged>会引发事件，如果新的或旧选择表中占一行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event is not raised if the new or old selection contains only cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>如果新的或旧选择仅包含单元格，则不会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The list of cells that are currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 当前所选的单元格的列表。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells*> collection changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells*>集合更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells*>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the SelectedCellsChanged event to be notified when the collection of selected cells is changed.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理 SelectedCellsChanged 事件，以更改所选单元格的集合时收到通知。

trans-unit.source: If the selection includes full rows, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event is also raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果所选内容包括完整的行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=fullName>也会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs.AddedCells%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs.RemovedCells%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs> in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs.AddedCells%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs.RemovedCells%2A>从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs>的事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs.RemovedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs.AddedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how rows and cells are selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示如何在中选择行和单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SelectionMode and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties together define the selection behavior for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: SelectionMode 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>属性共同定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>选择行为</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the selection mode is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode>, the user can select multiple items where the item type is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择模式为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode>，用户可以选择其中的项类型定义的多个项<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: If the selection mode is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode>, the user can only select single items.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择模式为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode>，用户只能选择单个项。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies how rows and cells are selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何在中选择行和单元格的枚举值之一<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether rows, cells, or both can be selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*> property for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> that contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*>属性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> ，其中包含指定的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: Use the SetDetailsVisibilityForItem method when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> does not currently exist for an `item`; for example, while a row is being auto-generated.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SetDetailsVisibilityForItem 方法时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>当前不存在为`item`; 例如，虽然行正在自动生成。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>

trans-unit.source: The object in the row for which <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*> is being set.
trans-unit.target: 中的行的对象<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*>设置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> to set for the row that contains the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref>要设置以用于包含项的行。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column is being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 对列进行排序时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> object becomes available for reuse.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>对象变为可供重用。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A> property is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: 若要提高性能，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>属性设置为`true`默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> does not instantiate a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item in the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>不会实例化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>绑定的数据源中的每个数据项的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> objects only when they are needed, and reuses them as much as it can.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>对象仅当它们需要而且重复使用它们作为它得多地</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item that is currently in view and recycles the row when it scrolls out of view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>为每个数据项的当前视图中，当它滚动出视野时回收行的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This event enables you to make any necessary changes to a row before it is reused.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可以重用之前对行进行任何必要的更改。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this event to undo any changes that were made in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.LoadingRow> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此事件来撤消中所做的任何更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.LoadingRow>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.LoadingRow>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row details element becomes available for reuse.
trans-unit.target: 当行详细信息元素变得可供重用时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs one time for each row to which a new row details template is applied or for which a row details template is removed.
trans-unit.target: 为每个行的一次发生此事件，为一个新的行详细信息模板将应用或删除行详细信息模板。

trans-unit.source: A new details template is applied or removed in one of the following cases: - The row <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 新的详细信息模板是应用或删除在以下情况之一:-行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The row <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A> property value is `null` and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: -行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A>属性值是`null`和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event enables you to make any necessary changes to the row details element before it is reused.
trans-unit.target: 此事件，可对行详细信息元素进行任何必要的更改之前它将重复使用。

trans-unit.source: You will typically use this event to undo any changes that were made in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.LoadingRowDetails> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 通常将使用此事件来撤消中所做的任何更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.LoadingRowDetails>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.LoadingRowDetails>

trans-unit.target: 取消选择中的所有单元格<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制垂直网格线的画笔。
